text: Enedilma Poveda Silva (born 9 December 1968) is a Cuban track and road cyclist. She won the bronze medal at the 1987 Pan American Games in the 3000 m Individual Pursuit event, and was the first Cuban cyclist ever to win a medal at the Pan American Games. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Cyclists Category:Cuban sportspeople Category:Living people
title: Enedilma Poveda
